name: creative-boost
description: AI-Powered Creative Automation Pipeline for Social Campaigns

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run test:backend" "cd frontend && npm test"
